article.title: Status and history for [008]
article.para: No known problem at this time.

history.history-entry: Converted HTML entities to plain Unicode. Thanks to Adam Twardoch.
Language is likely some variant of Crioulo, Upper Guinea (iso639 pov). Thanks to Michael Cysouw and Philippe Verdy.
stage 4: http://gddc.pt/direitos-humanos/50anos-decl-univ-dh/Crioulo%20Guin%E9.html identified as the source. XML contributed by Eric Muller.
